title: december 7: devastation at pearl harbor
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia explains the logistics of the devastating attack on Pearl Harbor in 1941, and how it caused the US to enter World War II. In a lighter moment, Maia talks about the first rap song to be released on a major label. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
